628600.name: Don't Get Hit In The Face - Sountrack
628600.description:
The soundtrack from Don't Get Hit In The Face contains 13 move-worthy tracks from various artists.

A Virtual Friend - I Dont Cry
Axel Perra - Once again
Axl & Arth - Breathe
Axl & Arth - Funktown
David Amber - Here to Stay (feat. Amanda Droste)
Gostreyshen Lukas - Deep
In Camera - Nothing's Over
Kellee Maize - I Insist (J Glaze Remix)
Kellee Maize - In Tune (J Glaze Remix)
Kellee Maize - Mad Humans (J Glaze Remix)
kwaDj - Found emotions OriginalMixM
Pokki DJ - Born Free
Pokki DJ - Stardust
